author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of #38110.
See description and links in master PR.

#### PR validation:
The 12_3_X backport (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38103) has already been deployed in production and the results are as expected, see comment in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38103#issuecomment-1140193579

#### Backport:
Backport of #38110
title: [12_4_X] update BeamSpot HLT client to use correct raw data from TCDS
